document.full_text: the federal reserve should begin to hike interest rates in coming months, the organization for economic cooperation and development said on wednesday, as it raised its outlook for u.s. economic growth.
document.title: oecd: fed should begin to hike interest rates
lines_and_colors: the federal reserve should begin to hike interest rates in coming months, the organization for economic cooperation and development said on wednesday, as it raised its outlook for u.s. economic growth.
